meanings.sent1: The bihourly train arrives at the station regularly.
meanings.sent2: The bihourly garbage collection helps keep the neighborhood clean.
meanings.sent3: I wish my bihourly alarm clock would stop waking me up so early!
meanings.sent4: The bihourly rainfall made the garden bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The bihourly reminders to take breaks keep me on track with my work.

meanings.sent1: The bihourly bus service is convenient for commuters.
meanings.sent2: The bihourly meetings are becoming too frequent for my liking.
meanings.sent3: Having bihourly snack breaks is making me gain weight!
meanings.sent4: The bihourly phone calls from my mom are starting to annoy me.
meanings.sent5: The bihourly updates on the project progress are keeping everyone informed.
